lines.text:
Welcome to the tech demo of the
Rainebow Engine and Chapter 3.

Ok look, Madeline did that thing
again where she bit off more than
she could chew.
THAT DOESN'T MEAN THIS IS BAD!!1!

It just means that the engine is
(mostly( finished, but the game
content is going to take some more
time.

It's a bummer, but Madeline
can only cut back on so much
sleep to keep working before
she snaps...

And we all agree,
that rarely ends well.

When you go through this demo
you'll get a pretty good sense of how
things are going to work.
